message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. I propose a price of $12000 for the product. I understand its value to you is $15000, so I hope this offer reflects a fair compromise.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9500. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I appreciate your input. In light of our discussion, I would like to propose a revised price of $10500 for the product. This price reflects a middle ground between our respective positions and I believe it will be agreeable to both of us.
I appreciate your revised offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to propose a price of $9000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. Considering our previous discussions and the value you place on the product, I am willing to consider a price of $9500. I believe this offers a fair compromise while also allowing me to maintain a satisfactory profit margin.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit hesitant. I'd like to propose a price of $8800. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your position and I am willing to negotiate further. Based on our discussions, I am proposing a price of $9000 for the product. I believe this strikes a balance between our interests.

I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit far from my target price. I'd like to propose a price of $8200. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence and understanding of the product's value to you. Based on our previous discussions and your latest proposal, I am willing to consider a price of $8500 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'd like to propose a price of $8000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
